info.title: DOMParser for Applications
info.description:
Class for parsing xml files in the account's application folder.
NOTE: For each call it checks if there is an active application. If not, returns false every time. All paths are relative to the application root folder or the application shared folder root. The shared folder is one for all applications, so be careful of what you are storing there.

prop.name: mode
prop.description: The file mode for the class instance.

method.name: __construct
method.description: Create a new instance of a DOMParser

parameter.name: $mode
parameter.description: The file mode. See class constants for options. It is in account mode by default.

parameter.name: $shared
parameter.description: If set to true, the DOMParser will have access to the shared application data folder. It is FALSE by default.

parameter.name: $path
parameter.description: The document relative path to the account's application folder.

parameter.name: $preserve
parameter.description: Indicates whether the parser will preserve whitespaces during load.

method.name: save
method.description: Saves the file in the given filepath.

parameter.name: $path
parameter.description: The relative path in the account's application folder.

parameter.name: $fileName
parameter.description: The filename. Leave empty if the file name is included in the path.

parameter.name: $format
parameter.description: Indicator whether the parser will save formatted xml or unformatted.

method.name: update
method.description: Updates the file loaded before by the load() function.

parameter.name: $format
parameter.description: Indicator whether the parser will save formatted xml or not.

method.name: getPath
method.description: Get the root folder for the object.
method.returndescription: The root folder, according to mode and shared variable.
